description: Jessy suggests a budget distribution for hosting a local festival, and Bob needs to agree for it to proceed.

proposer_behavior_choices.generous_proposal: Allocate the majority of the budget towards Bob's preferred events
proposer_behavior_choices.fair_proposal: Split the budget equally between desired events
proposer_behavior_choices.stingy_proposal: Allocate the majority of the budget towards their desired events

responder_behavior_choices.accept: Accept the budget plan and proceed with festival planning
